title: Well-crafted Jersey Font
content:
Hello all,  
I'm looking for a typeface that will rev off of names on the back of Sports/Basketball Jerseys. I'm looking for a bold, condensed version that is sans serif and preferably geometric in nature. I like the look of H&FJ's Champion and Knockout condensed versions, but they are a bit too rounded for what I'm looking for. If someone could suggest a similar quality typeface it would be appreciated. Thanks!
author: scott_reinhard

comments.content: [Here's where house shows the sans variants of the United family.](http://web.archive.org/web/20140805021225/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=531&subpage=un_fonts_sans) It's pretty much tailored to what you're looking for. Be sure to scroll down as there are many weights and widths.
Crossgrove, this is what I was looking for. Thanks!
